org.forgerock.openidm.provisioner

Interface ConnectorConfigurationHelper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConnectorInfoProviderService

    public interface ConnectorConfigurationHelper
    Helper methods which assist with generating connector configuration. These methods can be called to validate connector configurations as well as check which connectors are available for configuration. After each phase of generated configuration the user can customize the properties generated and have them validated.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CONFIGURATION_PROPERTIES
      configuration property that holds the actual connector configuration (passed to the connector)
      static String CONNECTOR_NAME
      the connector name (within connectorRef)
      static String CONNECTOR_REF
      configuration property that describes the connector's meta-data
      static String OBJECT_TYPES
      configuration property that holds the connector object type detail

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.forgerock.json.JsonValue generateConnectorCoreConfig(org.forgerock.json.JsonValue params)
      Generate the core configuration The implementer of this method must ensure proper encryption/decryption of private properties according to the schema definition.
      org.forgerock.json.JsonValue generateConnectorFullConfig(org.forgerock.json.JsonValue params)
      Generate the full configuration The implementer of this method must ensure proper encryption/decryption of private properties according to the schema definition.
      org.forgerock.json.JsonValue getAvailableConnectors()
      Get available connectors from an installation
      String getProvisionerType()
      Return the provisioner type that is used to manage configuration/connectors created by this configuration helper.
      Map<String,Object> test(org.forgerock.json.JsonValue params)
      Test the given configuration.
